attributes.action: Save the retired HMS Saxifrage from the scrapyard
attributes.additional_details: We are the q-ship trust and we are stuck holding the baby so to speak we need your help to save this unique opportunity from being lost forever
attributes.background: Hms saxifrage was a Q-ship during World War One also known as a mystery ship, an anti submarine vessel used to trick a Uboat into surfacing and sinking the enemy, She needs help to survive and bring her history back to life via a museum and tea rooms onboard! We can’t do this without help

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The HMS Saxifrage appears to be privately owned, and so decisions about its future are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.
